description:
**Fix Overview**:

To mitigate the elevation of privilege vulnerability (CVE-2024-43625) in Microsoft Windows VMSwitch:

1. Download and apply the appropriate KB updates based on your Windows version from the links provided below.
2. Restart your system to finalize the installation and ensure all updates take effect.

**Details**:
- The updates address a critical vulnerability linked to a use after free condition, which could potentially be exploited to gain elevated privileges on affected systems.
- Ensure your system is running one of the affected Windows builds listed below before proceeding with the update.

**Update Packages**:
- For Windows 11 Version 24H2: [KB5046617](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5046617)
- For Windows 11 Version 23H2: [KB5046633](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5046633)
- For Windows 11 Version 22H2: [KB5046633](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5046633)

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure you are running one of the specified Windows builds:
  - Windows 11 Version 24H2: 10.0.26100.2314
  - Windows 11 Version 23H2: 10.0.22631.4460
  - Windows 11 Version 22H2: 10.0.22621.4460
- Backup critical data before proceeding with the updates.
